hero.tagline: Unlock your natural glow with our potent Vitamin C serum

overview.description: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is a powerful antioxidant serum that brightens and evens out your skin tone, reducing the appearance of dark spots and hyperpigmentation.

benefits.description: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum helps to brighten your complexion, giving you a more even and radiant skin tone.
The serum's powerful antioxidant properties help to reduce the appearance of dark spots and hyperpigmentation, leaving your skin looking smoother and more even.

usage.instructions: Apply 2-3 drops of GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum in the morning before sunscreen for optimal results.
steps: Apply 2-3 drops of GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum
Follow up with moisturizer and sunscreen

safety.warnings: Mild tingling may occur for sensitive skin. If irritation persists, discontinue use.
